note:
I believe I've fixed the follow/federation issue - #Caddy was not playing well with others, specifically with the responses from other servers. My apologies if you get duplicate requests from me, though I believe those should be few and far between.

Nice to meet all of you - quick bio / #Introduction of me:
- I run this server primarily as a personal instance.
- I believe in #SocialJustice, #HousingJustice, #EnvironmentalJustice and their subconcepts inclusive of #HumanRights .
- I'm here because, well, the #FediVerse is an awesome place that we all want to be - some folks just haven't realized it yet and are stuck on the old paradigm.
- I'm from #CentralIllinois - local and state politics are much more aligned with our values here than in Indiana where we moved from. We're all of an hour down the road from where we lived for a decade, but it's basically the polar opposite.
- #CovidIsNotOver - wear a damn mask. Alternatively, _don't look at me like I'm from Mars when I mask in public._ Seems a pretty low bar, honestly, but you'd be surprised...

Closely following the #UkraineWar because the right and just thing is for the entirety of Ukraine's territory to be immediately returned, and for Russia/Wagner to retreat to the borders before the initial incursion earlier in the decade - and for reparations to be paid to the Ukranian people.

I am heavily in favor of legalization and standardization of marijuana and its derivatives. We've known for many years that there are benefits, and a critical part of legalization needs to be standardization. Some states have done this well, and it results in directing the right compounds to achieve the expected/intended effect far more efficiently.

I have absolutely zero use for crypto/web3/nft/etc.

#FOSS is an amazing part of our software ecosystem. That includes all the libraries and toolchains that are FOSS and allow developers to not reinvent the wheel.

You'll also find me elsewhere on the #FediVerse, links coming soon...
